ValidationRule.description: Account External ERP ID should be filled if Case Type is Warranty Support OR Shipping Error. US : SFS-354
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND ( $Setup.Bypass_Configuration__c.Case_Process__c = FALSE, RecordType.DeveloperName = 'General', OR ( ISPICKVAL( Type , 'Warranty Support') , ISPICKVAL( Type , 'Shipping Error') ), NOT(ISBLANK( AccountId )), OR( Account.External_ERP_ID_Populated__c = false ), ISBLANK( Account.External_ERP_ID__c )
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Account External ERP ID should be filled if Case Type is Warranty Support OR Shipping Error.
